name: az-handy-berlin
description: Full-Stack Application for az-handy.berlin (React, Express, PostgreSQL)

scripts.dev: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$scriptPath = if ($env:INIT_CWD) { $env:INIT_CWD } else { (Get-Location).Path }; $script = Join-Path $scriptPath 'start-dev.ps1'; if (Test-Path $script) { Set-Location $scriptPath; & $script } else { Write-Host 'Error: start-dev.ps1 not found at $script' -ForegroundColor Red }"
scripts.dev:windows: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$scriptPath = if ($env:INIT_CWD) { $env:INIT_CWD } else { (Get-Location).Path }; $serverPath = Join-Path $scriptPath 'server'; $clientPath = Join-Path $scriptPath 'client'; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', "Set-Location '$serverPath'; npm run dev"; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', "Set-Location '$clientPath'; npm start""
scripts.server: pushd server && npm run dev && popd
scripts.client: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$scriptPath = if ($env:INIT_CWD) { $env:INIT_CWD } else { (Get-Location).Path }; $clientPath = Join-Path $scriptPath 'client'; $script = Join-Path $clientPath 'start-dev.ps1'; if (Test-Path $script) { & $script } else { Write-Host 'start-dev.ps1 not found. Using vite directly...' -ForegroundColor Yellow; $viteCmd = Join-Path $clientPath 'node_modules\.bin\vite.cmd'; if (Test-Path $viteCmd) { & $viteCmd } else { Set-Location $clientPath; npx vite } }"
scripts.build: pushd client && npm run build && popd
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install-server && npm run install-client
